resources.string: This is the maximum length, stop please
Cannot apply because of syntax error
The melody is too long so it was cropped
Are you sure you want to clear all?
The entered value is not in the specified range

Keys: 
[–] adds a pause 
[•] adds/removes a dot 
[8va] increases the octave by 1 
[8vb] decreases the octave by 1 
[v++] increases the duration by 2 times 
[v––] decreases the duration by 2 times 
 
Limits: 
Value — from 32 to 1, power of two. (Value X denotes 1/X of a whole note) 
Octave — from 0 to 3. 
Tempo — from 30 to 240 beats per minute. 
 
Syntax: 
Note — <value>[.][#]{c|d|e|f|g|a|b}<octave> 
Pause — <value>[.]- 
 
Text editing mode automatically replaces uppercase letters with lowercase letters. Tabs, line breaks, regular and non-breaking spaces, and sequences of such characters are replaced with spaces. 
 
Melody playing starts after the entered notes are played.

%s v%s

This app was created as a replacement for the Nokia composer app. You can create here simple single-voice melodies using text input or the piano keyboard.

Developer: Sribnyak Alexander
